title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7075.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7075.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part shall be to ensure that
incarcerated individuals are confined to individual occupancy housing units, and deprived of essential services, only when necessary, and for the least
amount of time necessary, to maintain the safety, security and good order of
the facility and, absent exigent circumstances, this period of confinement or
deprivation may not risk significantly compromising the health of the
individual. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

New

York State Register August 10, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue Issue 32, eff. 8/10/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
